ModMetaData.name: SmartHarvestOrganTax
ModMetaData.author: Yukina
ModMetaData.description:
[h1][b]SmartHarvestOrganTax[/b][/h1]
该模组新增一个命令，允许你通过简单操作智能地从俘虏身上收割器官。
操作方法： - 使用该命令框选俘虏； - 系统将自动添加所有相关手术清单； - 自动调整医疗限制。
你还可以在Mod设置中自定义以下内容： - 优先收割身体左侧或右侧的器官； - 使用的医疗限制。
[h1]English Description[/h1]
Adds a command that allows you to harvest organs from prisoners with a single, intelligent action.
How it works: - Simply drag to select the prisoners; - All surgery bills will be automatically queued; - Medical care settings will be adjusted accordingly.
You can customize in the mod settings: - The priority of which side’s organs (left or right) to harvest first; - The level of medical care used.
